Train station to Ventimiglia via Nice or Genoa
Apricale as well as Dolceacqua are beautiful towns tucked into the hinterland behind the resort town of San Remo within the Italian Riviera
Bring a road bike!  A link to a great PDF for hiking and road biking is here

Various amazing cuisine is spread throughout this village as well as neighboring ones.  Be sure they are open and don't be scared to simply purchase amazing fare from the local stores to cook at home.  La Rampa in Dolceacqua is also an amazing alternative nearby.
Rossese di Dolceacqua is the local DOC wine of the region
A few B&B's in the area
